Package com.intel.icecp.core.attributes

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Attributes
    Container class to manage the attributes for a Describable thing--think of this container as a set of attributes.
    OnAttributeChanged<T>
    Callback for observing attribute changes
    WriteableAttribute<T>
    Designates an attribute as writeable and adds WriteableAttribute.value(Object) for modifying the attribute value
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArchitectureAttribute
    Retrieve the OS architecture the JRE is installed for (e.g., 32 bit jre on a 64 bit system will return x86) Might have to do something more advanced to get the OS arch always correct: (e.g., http://mark.koli.ch/reliably-checking-os-bitness-32-or-64-bit-on-windows-with-a-tiny-c-app)
    AttributeMessage<T>
    Wrapper message for transporting attribute values over channels.
    AttributePermission
    Controls use of a Attribute; allowed actions are: .
    AttributesNamespace
    Describes the channel namespace for remote implementations of Attributes.
    BaseAttribute<T>
    Base class for building attributes
    ComplexConfigurationAttribute Deprecated
    this is only present to support the API changes to Module; it should be removed in 0.11.* and replaced with single attributes per configuration property; TODO remove this
    FormatAttribute<M extends Message>
    Attribute representing a format
    FormatAttribute.FormatInfo<M1 extends Message>
    Collects the necessary format info, i.e., FormatAttribute.formatInfo and BaseAttribute.type()
    IdAttribute
    Used for identifying a Describable thing by number; e.g.
    ModuleStateAttribute
    Describe the state of a module; see Module.State for possible values.
    NameAttribute
    Used for identifying a Describable thing by name; e.g.
    NodeUptimeAttribute
    Track the node uptime in milliseconds
    OperatingSystemAttribute
    Retrieve the operating system string reported to the JVM
    ProcessorLoadAttribute
    Capture and report the instantaneous CPU usage of the machine.
    StateChannelAdapter Deprecated
    this is only present to support Module.run(Node, Configuration, Channel, long); it will be removed in 0.11.*; TODO remove this
    StorageUsageAttribute
    Retrieve file storage information for the node
    StorageUsageAttribute.StorageInformation
    Expose the space metrics of a storage unit; all units are in bytes.
    StorageUsageAttribute.StorageUnits
    Represent a map of storage unit names to their retrieved storage information; TODO this should likely use Josh Bloch's ForwardingMap concept to avoid future incompatibilities
    WriteableBaseAttribute<T>
    Extension for the base attribute to allow simple reading and writing; note that if the value stored is a reference this class will return that reference, making the inner data modifiable across multiple users (if this is an issue consider cloning WriteableBaseAttribute.value and returning the clone).
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AttributeNotFoundException
    Signal the error case when an attribute is missing
    AttributeNotWriteableException  
    AttributeRegistrationException  
    CannotInstantiateAttributeException
